alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 8:31PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Yuma and northwestern Kit Carson Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 831 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Highland Center to 11 miles southwest of Eckley to 13 miles southeast of Cope. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wray. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 212 and 269. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
